title: About
preamble:
I am a highly driven, self-taught developer located in London, ON.
My coding journey began at the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic following my graduation with a Bachelor of Music from Western University. During the pandemic, I took the initiative to acquire new skills and independently learn the art of software development.

content.heading: Goals
content.text:
My ultimate goal is to gain experience as a Full Stack Developer. I am actively seeking opportunities that will allow me to apply my knowledge in a real-world setting and contribute to meaningful projects.
I am open to collaborations, internships, or entry-level positions where I can further develop my skills and learn from experienced professionals.

content.heading: Skills
content.text: I am proficient in applying the following key skills:
skills: Quickly learning and applying new technologies and methodologies
Efficiently managing time, prioritizing tasks, and meeting deadlines
Applying critical thinking skills to evaluate situations and make informed decisions
Being self-motivated and taking initiative for personal and professional growth
Remaining committed to continuously learning and staying updated with industry trends
Adapting to changing project requirements and embracing new methodologies

content.heading: Technologies
content.text: I have hands-on experience with a range of technologies, including but not limited to:

content.heading: Education
content.text:
I graduated from Western University in 2020 with a Bachelor of Music, specializing in Music Theory and Composition, and minoring in Philosophy.
 After graduation, I decided to pursue a career in software development and began my journey as a self-taught developer. I have since completed a number of online courses and continue to expand my knowledge through self-study and personal projects. 
 Some of the courses I have completed include:

courses.title: SQL and PostgreSQL: The Complete Developer's Guide

content.heading: Interests
content.text:
I have a strong enthusiasm for staying ahead of industry trends and emerging technologies.
My passion lies in crafting user-friendly and visually captivating applications. I seamlessly integrate my arts background into problem-solving, relishing the creative process of transforming ideas into functional software.
Beyond software development, my interests extend to cooking, eating, gardening, biking, indulging in professional wrestling, binge-watching King of the Hill, and immersing myself in a diverse range of music.
